Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied
Reviews.Author: dm
Reviews.Content: I had previously purchased the n9000 but returned it; This phone is a perfect upgrade to its predecessor.  I am completely happy with the purchase.  Here's the rundown;Pro's:Every feature works as expectedHeadset jack accepts generic 3.5mm plug, unlike previous versionQuality fit and finishBright screenCamera and flash work surprisingly well. It takes exceptional night shots; panoramic shots are a little "choppy"Phone is overall very fluid; it just works.  Works better than some name brand smart phones I have usedPhone shares many of the same chipsets as the popular phone it looks likeCon's:Lack of accessories (Cases, screen protector, etc.)Has a very thin, generic battery so battery life is a bit shorter than you would get with a name brand phone.  This is especially true if you are in a low/no service area.  Being mindful of this and shutting the cell radios and using wifi when in my basement office increases life dramatically.  I also frequently use airplane mode while I sleep and see only a few percent of battery life gone when I awake.I occasionally share this phone with my girlfriend, putting her T-Mobile SIM card in the second slot.  I have noticed degraded, decreased, and/or sometimes finicky service when both SIM cards are on.  Very minor however, and the Dual SIM feature works perfectly.When I had the n9000, the pre-boot test/diag menu was in English.  The menu on the n9330 is in Cantonese.  This probably only matters to those who want to develop or tinker.  Not a biggie, but thought I should mention itAll in all, a very nice phone at a price I can live with.  You don't have to trade an arm, leg, or take out a second mortgage to buy it.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS
Reviews.Author: John L. Butler
Reviews.Content: FIRST SHIPPING FROM HONG KONG-7 DAYS UNREAL AND SUPER FAST.  THE PHONE HAS PERFORMED AS DESCRIBED AND IS ABOUT AS SLICK AS YOU CAN GET.  SMOOTH OPERATION AND VERY FAST.  RESOLUTION IS HIGHER THAN SOME OF THE LESS EXPENSIVE SMART PHONES AND VERY EXCELLENT.  VERY CLOSE TO FULL HD.  THIS PHONE HAS MET MY EXPECTATIONS AND THEN SOME.  FOR THE PRICE YOU CANNOT GO WRONG.  I USE WITH T-MOBILE  AND THE WIFI IS SUPER FAST. update 1/14/2014-THE CAMERA REALLY TAKES GREAT PICS. IF YOU LIKE THE LARGE SCREEN AND A PHONE THAT OPERATES LIKE A TABLET THIS IS IT......

Reviews.Title: great phone. works like a champ, only one problem
Reviews.Author: baky
Reviews.Content: its great only problem is you cant get a good case for it. huge display great touch sensitivity. battery is subpar though

Reviews.Title: Not worth it
Reviews.Author: Nia Jordan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone, because it seemed to be a good alternative to the Galaxy s3. Boy, was I wrong. The phone was shipped and delivered quickly, but upon opening the packaging, I received something tooooootally different. The phone was GIGANTIC and slow and looked cartoony. It had no memory, the camera was laughable, and open apps would force closed every 10 minutes. Overall, I regret this purchase, and do not wish this on my worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: Return
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: Was worst than the older model . Wont recommend return choose the 8ooo instead. Freeze camera suck  just have battery issue
